amendment.description: To reestablish the maximum aggregate amount permitted to be provided by the taxpayers to Fannie Mae and Freddie Mac.

action.text: Amendment SA 917 proposed by Senator Vitter to Amendment SA 857.
Amendment SA 917 under the order of 10/20/2011, not having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 41 - 57. Record Vote Number: 179.
